title: Noumin Kanren no Skill bakka Agetetara Nazeka Tsuyoku Natta.
overview: In order to live a peaceful little life in the countryside, Aru Wayn, a young boy of 17, decides to improve his farming skills as a priority. Although he also improves his other abilities by lending a hand to his friends from time to time, he still makes a point of prioritizing his future career as a farmer. One day, he manages to increase his farming skills to the maximum level and thinks that he will finally be able to live his dream life. Howeverâ€¦ some unforeseen events are about to upset his plans.
